prompt:
Nurse: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Josef Moran?

Patient: Yeah.

Nurse: Great, Mr. Moran. I'm calling about your upcoming total knee replacement. Is this a good time to talk?

Patient: Yes. It's fine.

Nurse: Excellent, Mr. Moran. I hope your day is going well. Can you share a bit about how you've been spending your day so far?

Patient: I I don't wanna share about my day with you. I just wanna get through this conversation. Okay?

Nurse: Of course, Mr. Moran. I appreciate your time. I'm sure you must be looking forward to getting a new knee. Do you have any plans for what you'd like to do once you've recovered from your surgery?

Patient: I I told you, no small talk. I just wanna get on with the medical stuff.

responses.gpt4: I see, Mr. Moran. We'll move forward then. Are there any concerns or feelings you would like to share about your upcoming procedure?
responses.our_model: Absolutely, Mr. Moran. I apologize for any misunderstanding. Let's focus on the medical aspects of your upcoming procedure. How are you feeling about your total knee replacement?
